name: Eve Online Classic Forums Style (Alezra&Grey)
description: Classic forum style for Stylish plugin users or for browsers supporting user script or user JS. -> Stylish plugin available for firefox/chrome only -> Browsers supporting user script: chrome, internet exploder with IE7Pro, Safari with greasekit -> Browsers supporting user JS: opera. -> Style code may work also with other browsers/plugins, you can copy paste it from "show code"-button. Install manually or using the link below. More information and help from official thread at eve online forums.
additional_info: Features: -> Rather traditional colors. -> Minimal borders. -> No background image. -> More traditional stickies, announcements. -> More traditional unread/new posts. -> Smaller avatar images. -> Tables use full width of open browser window. -> Tooltips are hidden by default. -> Like counter below avatar image hidden by default (and code to hide all other like related stuff is included as option) -> Traditional forum font on post containers. -> More compact approach where usability is more important than eye candy.
